verses.roman:
lalita-bhūṣita rādhā dekhe yadi kṛṣṇa
duṅhe duṅhā milibāre hayena satṛṣṇa

synonyms: lalita-bhūṣita—decorated with lalita-alaṅkāra; rādhā—Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; dekhe—sees; yadi—if; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; duṅhe—both of Them; duṅhā—the two of Them; milibāre—to meet; hayena—become; sa-tṛṣṇa—very anxious.
translation: "When Lord Śrī Kṛṣṇa happens to see Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī decorated with these lalita ornaments, They both anxiously want to meet one another.
